mapper.select:
SELECT wrh.roo_id, wrh.roo_code, wrh.order_type, wrh.ro_id, wrh.ro_code, wrh.cust_order_no, wrh.company_id, wrh.warehouse_id, wrh.warehouse_code, wrh.supplier_id, wrh.customer_id, wrh.total_qty, wrh.tmp_putaway_qty, wrh.putaway_qty, wrh.ro_status, wrh.memo, wrh.create_user, wrh.create_time, cw.warehouse_name, cs.supplier_name FROM wms_roo_header wrh INNER JOIN cdm.cdm_warehouse cw ON cw.warehouse_id = wrh.warehouse_id INNER JOIN cdm.cdm_supplier cs ON cs.supplier_id = wrh.supplier_id
and wrh.roo_id = #{id}
